name: SnowGift Invasion
description:
Survive on a world invaded by snowmans (suprise, they don't like you...).

Progress through multiple worlds to clear them out.

Buy lootboxes in order to play. (wait what!?).

Each mission is randomized by a Christmas Gift (lootbox), the first gift gives a small arena and easy mission, the second one gives a large arena and somewhat difficul, and the third gift lauches you straight to the boss fight.

Good luck and appy gift spending.

CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D - Standard Shooter Movement

Left Mouse Button - Basic Swing

Right Mouse Button - Throw Ball

Spacebar - Jump (hold to jump higher)
